Wellness Habit Tracker+

- Single-file web app (one HTML file with inline CSS and JavaScript only), no external dependencies.
- Purpose: Help users build and maintain daily health and wellness habits by tracking activities such as hydration, meditation, exercise, and sleep.
- Features:
  - Customizable daily habits list with options to add, edit, or delete habits.
  - Interactive checklist UI for marking habits completed each day.
  - Calendar view displaying monthly habit completion with color-coded days for motivation.
  - Undo/redo functionality for recent marking/unmarking actions.
  - Persistent data storage using localStorage to save habits and completion history across sessions.
  - Printable summary report of completed habits by date range in a clean, print-friendly layout.
- Accessibility:
  - Fully ARIA-compliant components including proper roles, labels, and keyboard navigation support.
  - Keyboard shortcuts for adding habits (e.g., Enter), toggling completion (Space/Enter), undo (Ctrl+Z), and redo (Ctrl+Y).
- UI/UX:
  - Responsive design adapting gracefully from mobile to desktop.
  - Clear visual feedback for user interactions with accessible color contrast.
  - Minimalist, calm color palette aligning with health and wellness theme.
- No external libraries or fonts; all styles and scripts embedded inline.
- Offline capable: app fully functional without internet connection after first load.
